devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)
devdoc.details: This library handles deposits to and withdrawals from Aave liquidity pools.

deposit(uint256,uint16).details: Deposits funds to the Aave pool. Assumes that you have already approved >= the amount to Aave.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be deposited.

getBalance().details: Returns the fund's balance of the specified currency in the Aave pool.

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraws funds from the Aave pool.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be withdrawn.

withdrawAll().details: Withdraws all funds from the Aave pool.

devdoc.title: AavePoolController
